page.title: 10CHURCHES
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire {Churches {Anglican Grimoldby 3 Sunday services per month, 24 Sunday School members and 150 church members. Choir practices weekly South Cockerington 1 service every Sunday, 20 Sunday School members and 50 church members. Stewton 2 Sunday services per month and 25 church members Rector takes weekly class at School and visits Old Peoples Home monthly. Mother's Union - monthly {Methodist} Grimoldby 1 Service every Sunday, 6 Sunday School members and 37 church members. South Cockerington 1 weekday meeting and 2 church members Womens Fellowship and Anglican/ Meth- odist Womens Prayer Meeting - monthly
